Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: large library hall

Situated beneath a domed ceiling soaring two stories overhead, this cavernous library space is awash in hues of gold complemented by the organic patterning of the white marble floor and contrasted by the jet black accents found scattered throughout. Along the northern wall, a series of narrow pointed lancet arches lead back to the foyer, adjacent to which stands a large grand staircase leading upward to a smaller arch of similar style in the western wall. A pair of glass-paned doors are situated within the bookshelves lining the eastern wall and nestled under the balcony that overlooks the freestanding shelves of the main library space. The entirety of the eastern wall is filled with bookshelves, as well as the center of the space. Step ladders found throughout the room provide an additional form of access to the multitude of books on the shelves, all of which are lit from above by a pair of brass chandeliers hanging between numerous skylights within the ceiling overhead.

Along the northern wall, a series of narrow pointed lancet arches lead back to the foyer, adjacent to which stands a large grand staircase leading upward to a smaller arch of similar style in the western wall. A pair of glass-paned doors are situated within the bookshelves lining the eastern wall and nestled under the balcony that overlooks the freestanding shelves of the main library space. The entirety of the eastern wall is filled with bookshelves, as well as the center of the space. Step ladders found throughout the room provide an additional form of access to the multitude of books on the shelves, all of which are lit from above by a pair of brass chandeliers hanging between numerous skylights within the ceiling overhead.
one of the arches leading north

This is one of a series of high, pointed lancet arches set into the northern wall of the main library hall. Each arch is roughly fifteen feet high and four feet wide. The inside of each arch is painted white and about two feet deep, adorned with a gold-painted acanthus pattern similar to on the walls. The foyer is located to the south just beyond these arches. $(parent-desc)
This is one of a series of high, pointed lancet arches leading north into the foyer. $(parent-desc)
a glass-paned door leading northeast

A wide wooden door with glass panes leads to the northeast. It has been brushed with a rich golden stain. An acanthus pattern matching the carvings on the walls covers the bottom half of each door. $(parent-desc)
a glass-paned door leading northwest

A wide wooden door with glass panes leads to the northwest. It has been brushed with a rich golden stain. An acanthus pattern matching the carvings on the walls covers the bottom half of each door. $(parent-desc)
a glass-paned door leading southeast

A wide wooden door with glass panes leads to the southeast. It has been brushed with a rich golden stain. An acanthus pattern matching the carvings on the walls covers the bottom half of each door. $(parent-desc)
a glass-paned door leading southwest

A wide wooden door with glass panes leads to the southwest. It has been brushed with a rich golden stain. An acanthus pattern matching the carvings on the walls covers the bottom half of each door. $(parent-desc)
the grand staircase leading up
A simple black runner carpets the stairs as they lead up to the broad, pointed lancet arch on the second floor. $(parent-desc)
the high, pointed lancet arches

A series of high, pointed lancet arches set into the southern wall of the room. Each arch is roughly fifteen feet high and four feet wide. The inside of each arch is painted white and about two feet deep, adorned with a gold-painted acanthus pattern similar to that on the walls. The foyer is located through the arches to the south.
A series of high, pointed lancet arches leading to the foyer south of here.
the balcony
A wide balcony situated about halfway up the western wall. Beneath the carved railing of the banister is a series of bookcases in which A pair of glass-paned doors.
the ornately carved banisters of the staircase
The banisters of the staircase have been carved with intricate acanthus leaf patterns that have been lightly brushed with a golden stain.
one of the freestanding bookcases
A tall intricately carved freestanding bookcase situated in the main area of the room. The top is decorated with acanthus patterned moulding that complements the crown moulding of the walls.
A tall intricately carved freestanding bookcase situated in the main area of the room.
the bookcases

The tall, intricately carved freestanding bookcases are scattered sporadically around the space. Similarly-styled bookcases cover the western wall from floor-to-ceiling, flank the grand staircase to the north and the eastern wall beneath the balcony. Moulding carved with acanthus patterns adorns the tops of the bookcases, mirroring the crown moulding that surrounds the room.

The tall, intricately carved freestanding bookcases are scattered sporadically around the space. Similarly-styled bookcases cover the western wall from floor-to-ceiling, flank the grand staircase to the north and the eastern wall beneath the balcony.
the high domed ceiling

The high domed ceiling of this room rises more than twenty-five feet above the white marble floor. Most of the ceiling is encompassed in an oval shape which has been painted blue and white to resemble clouds. The dome of the ceiling is surrounded by crown moulding that has been carved with an intricate acanthus pattern. A pair of large brass chandeliers hang from above and provide additional light when the skylights set into the ceiling provide inadequate illumination.

The high domed ceiling of this room rises more than twenty-five feet above the white marble floor. A pair of large brass chandeliers hang from above and provide additional light when the skylights set into the ceiling provide inadequate illumination.
large brass chandelier

One of a pair of large brass chandeliers hanging from the domed ceiling. It is comprised of a series of brass rings, each increasingly larger than the one above it, held together by hundreds of strands of glass beads. Round brass candle holders, each with a wide white candle, are fixed at certain points on each brass ring allowing them to cast a warm glow over the room.
One of a pair of large brass chandeliers hanging from the domed ceiling.
the white marble floor
The floor of this room is comprised of smooth white marble. Small flecks of gold sparkle from within. The floor has been polished to a high sheen, almost allowing you to see a hazy image of yourself.
The floor of this room is comprised of smooth white marble.
ladder to the walkway
A sturdy stationary wooden ladder providing access to the wooden walkway about halfway up the floor-to-ceiling bookcases that cover the western wall.
A sturdy stationary ladder providing access to the wooden walkway about halfway up the floor-to-ceiling bookcases that cover the western wall.
one of the moveable ladders

One of the moveable ladders scattered about the room allows access to the books located out of reach on the higher shelves of the bookcases. They are fitted with brass wheels that allow them to be moved along the shelves as needed.
One of the moveable wooden ladders scattered about the room allows access to the books located out of reach on the bookcases.
the ornate crown moulding
Ornate, gold-embossed crown moulding protrudes slightly from the walls where they curve to meet the domed ceiling. It is elaborately carved with a variety of acanthus patterns.
the elaborate acanthus patterns
Elaborate acanthus leaf patterns adorn many of the surfaces of the room. This stylized leaf motif is most notable on the walls but also decorates the ceiling and arches.
the railing of the balcony
The gold-stained wooden railing of the balcony is intricately carved with an acanthus-leaf motif that travels along the entire length.
one of the brightdim, snow-covered skylights overhead
BrightlyDimly lit by above and covered in a fine blanket of snow, this is one of several skylights fitted at even intervals within the domed ceiling overhead.
the brightdim, snow-covered skylights overhead
BrightlyDimly lit by above and covered in a fine blanket of snow, a number of skylights are fitted at even intervals within the domed ceiling overhead.
BrightlyDimly lit by above and covered in a fine blanket of snow, a number of skylights are fitted at even intervals within the domed ceiling overhead.
the carpeted steps
The steps of the grand staircase lead up to a broad, pointed lancet arch on the second story of the northern wall. A simple black runner carpets the steps.
the wooden walkway
A wooden walkway about halfway up the floor-to-ceiling bookshelves of the western wall and accessed by a stationary wooden ladder, allowing easier access to volumes placed upon the higher shelves.
the bookcases on the western wall

The western wall of the room is covered floor-to-ceiling with tall, intricately carved bookcases and thus blocked from view. A walkway about halfway up the wall grants easier access to volumes placed upon the higher shelves.
the gold-stained northern wall

The northern wall of the room has been constructed of sturdy wood and lightly dusted with a golden stain. The view of the wall is blocked by a large grand staircase that stands centrally against it and leads up to the second floor. The staircase is flanked on either side by bookcases that reach about halfway up the wall.
The northern wall of the room is dominated by a large grand staircase leading up to the second floor, flanked on either side by bookcases that end about halfway up the wall.
the gold-stained southern wall
The southern wall of the room has been constructed of sturdy wood and lightly dusted with a golden stain. A series of high, pointed lancet arches have been set deep into the wall.
The southern wall of the room is crafted from gold-stained wood and contains a series of pointed lancet arches.
the gold-stained western wall
The western wall of the room.
The western wall of the room.
